name: Infinity Strike: Galaxy Shoote
description:
Infinity Strike: Galaxy Shooter Adventure is an exciting addictive epic galaxy war game with a lot of missions, invaders and a lot of spaceship upgrades. You must also have strategy skills to equip proper upgrades and use the appropriate skills during specific space missions to keep space frontier in peace.
FEATURES:
Charming sound and music, with HD graphics.
Brand new weekly tournaments against other players.
Full voiceover
Seven gorgeous scenes,Vivid sound effect!
Beautiful levels
Multiple extreme boss battles.
Vibrant Neon Graphics
